item.description:
Gazebo Concert Series

Bring your lawn chair and relax to the music of “Island Rhythm” from 7:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. in Elmwood Senior Center’s Gazebo. It’s free! Rain location is the Elmwood Community Center. Cosponsors are At-Home Care, Kearns & Kearns, Sheehan-Hilborn-Breen Funeral Home and Hoffman’s Summerwood. Call 561-8180 for information.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Island Rhythm at the Elmwood Community Center.
